name: Rover Piyoko In Western House
description:
Piyoko, the chick girl.
She is on her roving journey to look for her mum.

Last month, she searched in the beautiful fruits field, but couldn't find her mum.
'Mum～～, where are you～～???'

She left the fruits field and started her next journey.
As roving, this time she reached a fine western house.

That's Caton's house.
There're lots of dangerous traps in it.

Is her mum somewhere in the western house??
To catch Piyoko, Catol, FutePen, and Kumakku are waiting for her.

Caton acts as her mum.
Piyoko is mistaking Caton for her mum, because his body is the same color as Piyoko's.

Put traps and lead Piyoko to her mum.
The traps is alse effective against Catol, FutePen, and Kumakku.

All you need to do is just to select the place to put traps.
This game is so much hard game to predict how to lead Piyoko to her mum.

It's TandM's feature that you can controll easily and experience the fruitfull game.
Enjoy the journey of the total of 28 stages of the new puzzle game.

Is her mum in the western house??
Piyoko's roving journey will be completed??

The final chapter of Rover Piyoko trilog.

※Due to the differences of speed of characters, probably Kumakku can't clear stage23, FutePen 27 and 28.
Sorry mew...
